alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 28 at 3:09PM MST until March 01 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches, locally up to 20 inches Upper Cottonwoods. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North and Wasatch Mountains South of I-80. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected. Traction laws may be enacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers will taper off early this evening. Another round of moderate to heavy snow is expected to begin early Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80
